Study investigates connection between adverse experiences and mental, physical health during COVID-19
研究揭示了以前未知的尿液生物标志物，彻底改变了 COVID-19 等病毒感染的早期检测和治疗这项最近的研究利用光谱分析确定了用于检测急性 COVID-19 的新尿液生物标志物。研究结果表明，这些生物标志物可以为早期诊断、了解疾病的严重程度提供有价值的工具，并可能有助于针对 SARS-CoV-2 的内源性免疫防御机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Study-unveils-previously-unknown-urinary-biomarkers-revolutionizing-early-detection-and-treatment-of-viral-infections-like-COVID-19。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Study-unveils-previously-unknown-urinary-biomarkers-revolutionizing-early-detection-and-treatment-of-viral-infections-like-COVID-19。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7706aba1-d981-42aa-94a8-b7e0977e51eb Tue, 29 Aug 2023 00:26:00 -0400 Study unveils previously unknown urinary biomarkers, revolutionizing early detection and treatment of viral infections like COVID-19
